The affirmations R package was created for the Programming the Next Step course. This package offers a Shiny web application that classifies users into fun personality types based on pop-culture yes/no questions and provides randomized affirmations tailored to their type.

Package Overview:
The goal of the affirmations package is to provide an interactive personality quiz – users answer themed yes/no questions.Currently, the app includes the following personality types:Softie, Brat Summer Girl, Hyperfixated Internet Nerd, Millennial Core, Radical Righty. Each personality type has a bank of 10–15 affirmations and 5 specific yes/no classification questions. 
```{r setup}
library(affirmations)
```
